name: Darlene Bourgeois (Hope2nou95)
text: Wasn't very friendly on the day my son and I were there not to mention I lost a whole bottle of juice because the top popped off so easy. Never had that happen with other bottles. The products are good but the packaging isn't. Flavors are good.

resp.text: We're so sorry for your bottle mishap. You're more than welcome to stop back in and we will make you a new bottle for no charge to you. I encourage to stop in as we would be more than happy to replace the defective bottle for you.

name: Mike Jemison
text: Very helpful, friendly, knowledgeable staff. Store is very nice and clean. Prices are great as well. Walt and his staff are amazing to say the least.

resp.text: We have many years of experience, and try our hardest to help everyone that walks in the door.

name: Robin Blevins
text: Best place to be. Honest answers and treated like family.

name: Cheri DeRamus
text: Best place in tri-county area for all of your vaping needs. Friendliest people you will ever deal with!

name: Matthew Moody
text: Knowledgeable staff and very helpful. Good juice tasting bar.

name: Shea Brinegar
text: Walt is the best! His staff is amazing also.

resp.text: Thank you so much.  We look forward see you again.

name: Tim Jenkins
text: Best place in tri-county area. Price is good and best service you can ask for

name: Thomas Langley
text: Best in the area hands down

name: Ramona shivers
text: The best place to get your vape needs and the sweetest people

name: Brandon Owens
text: Great place. Great customer service.  Will definitely be back.

name: Robert Householder
text: Great vape shop!  Walt and his crew are awesome!

name: Heather Brown
text: Love the location.  Easy to get in and out with plenty of parking.  The staff is friendly!  The flavors are what I really like. Most places have the same stuff just named something else but Vape Factor has new , exciting flavors.

name: chad bennington
text: The guys in there are very knowledgeable about the vape products and have more flavors than any place I've ever been in . Hands down best place to go for vape products in Alabama. They have the biggest selection of top quality juice compared to anywhere I have ever seen .

name: lawana Dennis
text: Love this place!!

name: David Bush
text: Very helpful and friendly. There prices are pretty great and they offer a rewards program, which I highly reccomend you try.

name: Steve Lightfoot
text: The men there had a lot of were great!

name: Gary McCrea
text: Great people to deal with. I've shopped around and found out that they beat all competitors prices. Great in-house juices.

name: LeeAnn Dennis
text: Absolutely best customer service hands down. Walt and his staff are nothing short of amazing!!!! Love them!!

name: Richie Martin
text: The best vape shop in town

name: Taylor Faulx
text: Awesome place!! Definitely would keep going here!!

name: malcom copeland
text: Too early to say,  but a good start

name: Tonya Clark-Palmer
text: Great experience friendly folks. Know their stuff.

name: Bj Jones
text: Friendly staff and good products. Would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Heather Rae McDade
text: Everyone was very knowledgeable and helpful! Excellent prices & best juice!

name: wadecbr
text: This is the best Vape shop around anywhere near here. Walt  and the rest of his crew are  very knowledgeable and helpful.

name: Bonner Spradley
text: Don't sell my juice

name: Eric Echols
text: Best vape shop in the area.

resp.text: Yes sir we try our best.

name: Kenneth Wagner
text: Best vape store in town!
